metadata.title: CVE-2022-29885 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
The documentation of Apache Tomcat 10.1.0-M1 to 10.1.0-M14, 10.0.0-M1 to10.0.20, 9.0.13 to 9.0.62 and 8.5.38 to 8.5.78 for the EncryptInterceptorincorrectly stated it enabled Tomcat clustering to run over an untrustednetwork. This was not correct. While the EncryptInterceptor does provideconfidentiality and integrity protection, it does not protect against allrisks associated with running over any untrusted network, particularly DoSrisks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-29885` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtomcat9-java - 9.0.63-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tomcat9 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.0.63-1').
